statements: SELECT * FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, effectiveness_score FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns WHERE effectiveness_score > 7.5;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.8;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns WHERE campaign_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(effectiveness_score) AS avg_score FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_budget FROM guerrilla_campaigns ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM guerrilla_campaigns WHERE start_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, effectiveness_score FROM guerrilla_campaigns WHERE effectiveness_score > 4.5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_budget, DATE_FORMAT(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_start_date FROM guerrilla_campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget, effectiveness_score FROM guerrilla_campaigns ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM guerrilla_campaigns WHERE total_budget > 5000 AND effectiveness_score > 8;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_budget, effectiveness_score FROM guerrilla_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT c.campaign_name, cr.date, cr.impressions, cr.clicks, cr.conversions FROM guerrilla_campaigns c INNER JOIN campaign_results cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id WHERE cr.impressions > 10000 ORDER BY cr.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM campaign_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'Social Media';
SELECT campaign_id, performance_date, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_performance ON guerrilla_marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_performance.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_impressions DESC

SELECT campaign_name, engagement_type, engagement_value FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_engagement ON guerrilla_marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_engagement.campaign_id WHERE engagement_type = 'Social Media'
SELECT * FROM Campaigns
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM Campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 1000
SELECT * FROM Clicks JOIN Impressions ON Clicks.impression_id = Impressions.impression_id
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_date, conversion_type FROM Campaigns JOIN Conversions ON Campaigns.campaign_id = Conversions.campaign_id
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT c.campaign_name, i.impression_date, i.impression_location FROM Campaigns c INNER JOIN Impressions i ON c.campaign_id = i.campaign_id;

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM Campaigns c INNER JOIN Impressions i ON c.campaign_id = i.campaign_id INNER JOIN Clicks cl ON i.impression_id = cl.impression_id GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_clicks > 10;
SELECT * FROM campaign;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT channel_name, cost FROM marketing_channel WHERE cost > 100;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM marketing_strategy WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT audience_name, demographics->>'age' as age FROM audience WHERE demographics->>'gender' = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT channel_name, AVG(cost) FROM marketing_channel GROUP BY channel_name;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM marketing_strategy WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT audience_name, demographics->'age' AS age_group FROM audience WHERE demographics->'age' BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
